ngiemboon: Yɔɔn ŋwàʼne fóo mbwó mèŋ Pɔ̂ɔ, e Ssé la kwoŋ ngie n gwɔ́ ngàŋntúm Yěsô Keleto. N náa mbwó pi pʉ̀a Ssé pie pi néŋe Efésò, mbà pi la záb ntʉ́m na Yěsô Keleto, ńké ńzsé pɔ́ ndàʼ nò yé.
en: Paul,   an apostle of Christ Jesus by God’s will:  # 1:1 Eph 1:9

ngiemboon: Tá wege Ssé mbɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô Keleto ne ńcÿó gʉm gí, ńne ńnéŋe mbʉ́lè na pi!
en: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: Pege ne ńguʼte Ssé Tá pà Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto. À la gÿo nò mbòŋo na pege, ńná shúm mbòŋo ntsèm sie é fóo tàa tÿǒ né pege, ńná púʼu, ńcʉa na páʼ à la láʼ ńtemte wégè lâ Keleto,
en: Blessed is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavens in Christ.

ngiemboon: mbà à la cʉa na Keleto ńtsɔ́ʼɔ wégè, ńdɔg ńgÿo pʉ̀a pé tà fó ńnyé pɔ́ te nyɛte njÿó páʼ pege ge gwɔ́ mvfò yé é gwɔ́ pʉ̀a ndʉalʉ̌a, é gwɔ́ pate fʉa. À la lɔg páʼ à kwoŋo wégè,
en: For he chose us in him, before the foundation of the world, to be holy and blameless in love before him.  ,# 1:4 Jd 24

ngiemboon: ńzáb tà tyě sǎg tɛʼ ngie à ge cʉa na Yěsô Keleto é gÿo pege cʉ́ʼ púɔ pé. Á gwɔ́ pɔ́ we lekwoŋ, ńké ḿboŋo yé tɛʼ.
en: He predestined us to be adopted as sons through Jesus Christ for himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,

ngiemboon: À la lɔgɔ wégè ńgÿo púɔ pé légwɔ́ gie pege ge guʼte yé na máa nò té fʉ̀ʼ gẅie à la gÿo. À la cʉa na páʼ à la temte wégè lâ Míŋ we gẅie à kwoŋo yé tɛʼ, ńcÿó gʉm yégè, púʼu, á gwɔ́ kwàʼ máamáa nò tɛʼ.
en: to the praise of his glorious grace   that he lavished on us in the Beloved One.  # 1:6 Mt 3:17; Jn 3:35; 10:17; Col 1:13

ngiemboon: Míŋ we ŋwɛ́ la lɔg metse mé ńdɔg ńcuʼu wégè, pege tsẅɛ́. E Ssé lege mefʉa mégè. Yɔɔn áa nò té fʉ̀ʼ gie Ssé la lɔg ńcÿó gʉm yégè,
en: In him we have redemption   through his blood, the forgiveness  # 1:7 Ps 25:11; Mt 9:2; Mk 2:5; Lk 24:47 of our trespasses, according to the riches of his grace

ngiemboon: áa fùʼ gie à la náa mbwó pege tà á gyɔ́ɔn gyɔ̌ɔn, ńgwaa ná, ńtsɔ́ʼ legye ségè pege zsé nò.
en: that he richly poured out on us with all wisdom and understanding.

ngiemboon: Áa yɛ̌ tá pege zsé mmó gie à la záb, mbà á la zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ lelyěen. Ayɛ̌ mmó gwɔ́ gie à la tʉ́ njÿó, á poŋo yé poŋ, á záb ngie à ge láʼ lɔgɔ Keleto é gÿo à pumte,
en: He made known to us the mystery of his will,   according to his good pleasure that he purposed in Christ  # 1:9 Rm 9:11

ngiemboon: ńgwɔ́ ngie afʉ̀ʼ ge láʼ gwɔ́ tà kuʼ, yé Ssé cúʼte shúm ntsèm sie ée tÿǒ lepwó lâ sie ée ndùmo ssé tsetsáʼ, é ná ntsèm ntsèm mbwó Keleto, à ne sáʼa pɔ́ gíle yé.
en: as a plan for the right time    #— #to bring everything together in Christ,  # 1:10 Mt 1:17; Eph 5:2 both things in heaven and things on earth  # 1:10 Php 2:10 in him.  # 1:10 Col 1:16

ngiemboon: Peg la zẅɛ́ʼ pɔ́ páʼ peg la nnɛ́ na Keleto, tá ńgẅiin yég jʉʼ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pʉ̀a pie à gÿǒ pɔ́ tsẅɛ́, á nue e Ssé la tʉ́ njÿó ńtsɔ́ʼɔ wég. Á gwɔ́ páʼ à la záb. E Ssé piŋ ńgÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ pɔ́ páʼ à la záb ngie à ge gÿo púʼu.
en: In him we have also received an inheritance,   because we were predestined  # 1:11 Pr 19:21 according to the plan of the one who works out everything in agreement with the purpose of his will,

ngiemboon: À lɔ̌ɔn ńtsɔ́ʼɔ wégè púʼu, légwɔ́ gie peg pie peg ka vɔgɔ lézáb ntʉ́m na Keleto, peg ge guʼte yé Ssé, á nue à gǔʼ tɛʼ.
en: so that we who had already put our hope   in Christ might bring praise to his glory.  # 1:12 Mk 10:37

ngiemboon: Á gʉa na pi gí, mbà pi ka júʼu shwóŋè gie áa ye nénʉ́, é gwɔ́ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo gẅie Ssé ka cʉa pɔ́ mǒ tá ńgÿo pi tsẅɛ́. Pi ka jǔʼ púʼu, ńzáb tʉ́m gẅí na Keleto, e Ssé cÿɔʼɔ liŋé yé na pi, ńdɔgɔ ńnyɛɛ ngie pi ee pʉ̀a pé. Ayɛ̌ liŋé gwɔ́ Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a gie à la kaʼ ngie à ge náa mbwó pege.
en: In him you also were sealed with the promised Holy Spirit   when you heard the word of truth,  # 1:13 Col 1:5; 2Th 2:10 the gospel of your salvation, and when you believed.

ngiemboon: À Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ zyèssé na fùʼ gie Ssé la cwoŋte ńzáb lénáa mbwó pʉ̀a pé. E Ssé lɔgɔ ńnyɛte éshwóŋo wégè ngie pege ge láʼ gẅiin setsɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ gie à ge láʼ pú kẅile wégè na nò tepòŋ. Páʼ áa púʼu la, pege ne ńguʼte Ssé, á nue à gǔʼ tɛʼ.
en: The Holy Spirit is the down payment   of our inheritance, until the redemption of the possession, to the praise of his glory.

ngiemboon: Páʼ mèŋ n ka júʼ ngie pi ne ńkẅiʼi ńzába ntʉ́m gẅí na Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô, ńgíŋ ńjúʼ ngie pi ne ńkwoŋo pʉ̀a Ssé metsèm la,
en: This is why, since I heard about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all the saints,

ngiemboon: n gee fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm ńne sẅíŋte Ssé, ḿbiŋe síe yé na twó sí.
en: I never stop giving thanks for you as I remember you in my prayers.

ngiemboon: N ne sẅíŋte Ssé Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto, á yé Tá gẅie à gẅiin legúʼ, ngie à náa gẅí zẅìge lɔg ńgẅiin zsénò, mbɔɔ lɔg ńgẅiin shÿó lélɔg ńcwoŋo ńzsé yé tà éshwóŋo nò.
en: I pray that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father,   would give you the Spirit  # 1:17 Or a spirit,# 1:17 Ps 51:12 of wisdom and revelation  # 1:17 1Pt 4:13 in the knowledge of him.

ngiemboon: N giŋé ńne sẅíŋte yé, ngie à gÿo ntʉ́m gẅí zsé kyɛ̀ʼ yé, légwɔ́ gie pi ge cwoŋo zsé mmó gie à lɔ̌ɔn ńtóŋo gẅí ńtí yɛ̌. Mbɔɔ páʼ pi ge zsé máamáa fùʼu mbòŋo gie pi lâ petsɔ́ pʉ̀a pie à la tsɔ́ʼɔ wɔ́b ge gÿo kẅé, é gwɔ́ tÿɔgɔ́ gẅí.
en: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened so that you may know what is the hope   of his calling,  # 1:18 Col 3:15 what is the wealth of his glorious inheritance in the saints,

ngiemboon: N giŋé ńne sẅíŋte yé ngie à gÿo pi zsé ngie metʉ̀ mé pú fáŋ ńcʉa metʉ̀ ntsèm, mbɔɔ ngie à gÿo pi zsé páʼ mɛ̌ metʉ̀ tóonte wégè pazáb ntʉ́m na yé púʼu.
en: and what is the immeasurable greatness of his power   toward us who believe, according to the mighty working of his strength.

ngiemboon: Mɛ̌ metʉ̀ ée mie Ssé la lɔg ńgÿo Keleto zíme tsetsɛ̀ɛ mepfó, á lɔg ńgÿo á kwɔ́ʼ né tÿǒ lepwó, ńnéŋe na gwoŋó pwó yé, yetʉ̀.
en: He exercised this power in Christ by raising him from the dead and seating him at his right hand   in the heavens  # 1:20 Jn 20:17; Eph 1:3; 2:6; 3:10; 6:12; Php 2:10; 1Pt 3:22  #— #

ngiemboon: Á gwɔ́ jʉʼó ńdɔgɔ ḿbú ńcʉa ngwòŋ mecÿɔ́ʼ Ssé pâ mefùɔ pɔ́b mbɔɔ setsɔ́ shúm sie é gẅiin ngʉ̀ʼ tÿǒ lepwó. Á cʉa mânyìŋ ntsèm tà páʼ angàŋ lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ wɔ̌ wɔ́ɔ, kà pɔ́ ná yɔɔn kème njÿó wɔ́ɔ, kà pɔ́ ná gie á ge láʼ tá tó wɔ́ɔ.
en: far above every ruler and authority, power and dominion, and every title given,  ,# 1:21 2Tm 2:19 not only in this age but also in the one to come.  # 1:21 Mk 10:30

ngiemboon: E Ssé leen ńnéŋ shúm ntsèm mbwó yé. E Ssé la gwɔ́ tà néŋe kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ na mbwó mé, ńgÿo á gwɔ́ mbwó cúʼtè pʉ̀a Ssé, ńgwɔ́ twó, légwɔ́ gie pʉ̀a cúʼtè ge ne júʼu ncwò wé.
en: And he subjected everything under his feet   ,# 1:22 Ps 8:6; Rm 13:1; 1Co 15:27; 1Pt 3:22 and appointed him  # 1:22 Lit gave him as head  # 1:22 Col 2:10 over everything for the church,

ngiemboon: Acúʼtè pʉ̀a Ssé, ée mbùm nnɛ́ Keleto. Aa tsɛ̀ɛ cúʼtè pʉ̀a pé fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm, yé zɔ pǔ ńgwɔ́ jʉʼ ntsèm tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó.
en: which is his body,   the fullness  # 1:23 Jn 1:16 of the one who fills all things  # 1:23 Col 3:11 in every way.
